instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Peel and quarter the potatoes. Cut the onion into 1 / 2 - inch - wide strips. Place the potatoes in a large bowl. Add the capers, garlic, and shallot. Season with salt and pepper. Add the potatoes and toss to coat.. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour. Re. In a large sauce. Remove the potatoes and marinade...

In a large bowl, combine the cucumber, bell pepper, tomatoes, onion, bell pepper, olives, bell peppers, and cucumber. Add the oil, salt, and pepper. Mix well. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Ser................................

Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, combine the corn, butter, water, and cheese. Mix well. Add the corn and mix well. Spread in a greased 9x13 baking dish. Bake for 30 minutes............................................

Brown hamburger and drain. Add in hamburger and onion. Cook till brown. Add in potatoes and cook till potatoes are tender. Add in hamburger and cook till done......................................................
